home.aboutMe: I'm a Software Development Technician graduated from CESDE and a Systems Engineering student at ITM. I'm passionate about programming and enjoy creating efficient, well-structured solutions. I like facing new challenges, learning modern technologies, and collaborating on real-world projects.
home.description: I speak English, enjoy reading, and always strive to create well-structured and clean websites. I'm very curious and ready to learn everything I need to excel and get hired as a developer.
home.aboutPage: This website is a personal presentation developed with React.js, designed to showcase my knowledge, certificates, and experience in software development.
home.aboutPageB: It applies best practices in responsive design, reusable components, JavaScript file integration, and route management. It also demonstrates my ability to develop personal projects with a professional structure.
home.firstText: Main section with my introduction, technical knowledge, and links to professional networks.
home.secondText: Displays my backend and web developments, links to their repositories, and pages deployed on Vercel.
home.thirdText: A collection of certificates from Platzi, English training, and technical education.
